short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage multiple identities in "Fallen London" browser game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will let you switch between multiple different "alts" from inside the game itself, removing the need to constantly keep open a bevy of tabs/windows for them.
